Attack Of Opportunity: May use a Reaction to Strike a foe that uses a manipulate action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square while moving
Double Slice: May attack with two weapons simultaneously
Incredible Improvisation: May add +4 to an untrained skill check as a free action 1/day
Orc Ferocity: May use a Reaction to retain 1 Hit Point when brought to 0 Hit Points 1/hour
Orc Weapon Carnage: Critical hits with a falchion, greataxe, or orc weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Orc Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon orc weapons/Treats orc weapons as one category lower
Shield Block: Shield negates damage up to its hardness and absorbs half of remaining damage
Snagging Strike: Successful Strike inflicts flat-footed on target for 1 rd
Victorious Vigor: May use a Reaction to gain 1 temporary Hit Points for 1 rd when foe drops
Woodland Elf: May always Take Cover within forest terrain

Save Notes:

Orc Superstition: May use a Reaction to gain +1 vs. magic
Pervasive Superstition: +1 vs. magic
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
